page.title: 08Farming
page.content: Most of the{farmers}interviewed had farms with a large acreage, the sample ranged from 49 to 1500 acres. Most farmers employed workers but the maximum number was 9. Only a few farmers had lived on their farms for all of their lives, but most had worked their farms for over 10 years. Of the 7 farmers interviewed, 2 were entirely dairy, 1 entirely cereal and the rest were mixed farms. The total for livestock from this sample was 104 dairy cows, 3605 sheep and 170 other cattle. 4 of the farms are situated on the outskirts of Newton Solney and Repton. There is one farm actually in the village of Repton and two in Newton Solney
